posts.post_title: WTB 1924 Diaz Cigs Walter Johnson and other HOFers
posts.post_content:
I missed the one on ebay last week and it hurts.  If anyone has one they could sell, please give me a shot at it.  Also looking for all other HOFers I don't have.  Currently at 5/13.  My email is [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking!
